hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side C: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Path of Skulls (100/100 reachable).Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side C: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Boss Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Forest Trial Eye Switch Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #the Stone of Agony#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #5# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
